verses.verse: Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> cause <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> her <S%H8441>abominations;<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> Your <S%H4351>birth<s%> and your <S%H4138>birth<s%> is of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanite;<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> was your <S%H1>father,<s%> and your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite.<s%>

As for your <S%H4138>birth,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> you were <S%H3205>born<s%> your <S%H8270>navel<s%> was not <S%H3772>cut,<s%> neither were you <S%H7364>washed<s%> in <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H4935>cleanse<s%> <S%H4414>you;<s%> you weren't salted at <S%H4414>all,<s%> nor <S%H2853>swaddled<s%> at <S%H2853>all.<s%>

No <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>pitied<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> to do <S%H259>any<s%> of these things to <S%H2550>you,<s%> to have compassion on <S%H7993>you;<s%> but you were cast out in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H7704>field,<s%> for that your <S%H5315>person<s%> was <S%H1604>abhorred,<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you were <S%H3205>born.<s%>

When I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>you,<s%> and saw you <S%H947>wallowing<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood,<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1818>you,<s%> Though you are in your blood, <S%H2421>live;<s%> <S%H559>yes,<s%> I said to <S%H1818>you,<s%> Though you are in your blood, <S%H2421>live.<s%>

I <S%H5414>caused<s%> you to <S%H7233>multiply<s%> as that which <S%H6780>grows<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and you <S%H7235>increased<s%> and grew <S%H1431>great,<s%> and you <S%H935>attained<s%> to <S%H5716>excellent<s%> <S%H5716>ornament;<s%> your <S%H7699>breasts<s%> were <S%H3559>fashioned,<s%> and your <S%H8181>hair<s%> was <S%H6779>grown;<s%> yet you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore.<s%>

Now when I <S%H5674>passed<s%> by <S%H7200>you,<s%> and looked at <S%H6256>you,<s%> behold, your time was the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H1730>love;<s%> and I <S%H6566>spread<s%> my <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over <S%H3680>you,<s%> and covered your <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H7650>yes,<s%> I swore to <S%H935>you,<s%> and entered into a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> and you became mine.
Then <S%H7364>washed<s%> I you with <S%H4325>water;<s%> <S%H7857>yes,<s%> I thoroughly washed away your <S%H1818>blood<s%> from <S%H5480>you,<s%> and I anointed you with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

I <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you also with embroidered <S%H7553>work,<s%> and <S%H5274>shod<s%> you with <S%H8476>sealskin,<s%> and I <S%H2280>dressed<s%> you about with fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> you with <S%H4897>silk.<s%>
I <S%H5710>decked<s%> you with <S%H5716>ornaments,<s%> and I <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H6781>bracelets<s%> on your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and a <S%H7242>chain<s%> on your <S%H1627>neck.<s%>
I <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H5141>ring<s%> on your <S%H639>nose,<s%> and <S%H5694>earrings<s%> in your <S%H241>ears,<s%> and a <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> on your <S%H7218>head.<s%>

Thus you were <S%H5710>decked<s%> with <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver;<s%> and your <S%H4403>clothing<s%> was of fine <S%H8336>linen,<s%> and <S%H4897>silk,<s%> and embroidered <S%H7553>work;<s%> you <S%H398>ate<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> and <S%H8081>oil;<s%> and you were <S%H3966>exceedingly<s%> <S%H3302>beautiful,<s%> and you <S%H6743>prospered<s%> to royal <S%H4410>estate.<s%>

Your <S%H8034>renown<s%> went <S%H3318>forth<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations<s%> for your <S%H3308>beauty;<s%> for it was <S%H3632>perfect,<s%> through my <S%H1926>majesty<s%> which I had <S%H7760>put<s%> on <S%H5002>you,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

But you <S%H982>trusted<s%> in your <S%H3308>beauty,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> because of your <S%H8034>renown,<s%> and poured <S%H8210>out<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> on everyone who passed <S%H5674>by;<s%> his it was.

You <S%H3947>took<s%> of your <S%H899>garments,<s%> and made for yourselves high <S%H1116>places<s%> <S%H6213>decked<s%> with various <S%H2921>colors,<s%> and played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> on <S%H935>them:<s%> the like things shall not come, neither shall it be so.

You also <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of my <S%H2091>gold<s%> and of my <S%H3701>silver,<s%> which I had <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> and made for yourself <S%H6754>images<s%> of <S%H2145>men,<s%> and played the prostitute with <S%H2181>them;<s%>

and you <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H7553>embroidered<s%> <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3680>covered<s%> <S%H5414>them,<s%> and set my <S%H8081>oil<s%> and my <S%H7004>incense<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%>

My <S%H3899>bread<s%> also which I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H5560>you,<s%> fine flour, and <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> with which I <S%H398>fed<s%> <S%H5414>you,<s%> you even set it <S%H6440>before<s%> them for a <S%H5207>pleasant<s%> <S%H7381>aroma;<s%> and thus it <S%H5002>was,<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

Moreover you have <S%H3947>taken<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> whom you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> to <S%H2076>me,<s%> and you have sacrificed these to them to be <S%H398>devoured.<s%> Was your <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> a small <S%H4592>matter,<s%>
that you have <S%H7819>slain<s%> my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> them <S%H5674>up,<s%> in causing them to pass through the fire to them?

In all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> and your <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> when you were <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore,<s%> and were <S%H947>wallowing<s%> in your <S%H1818>blood.<s%>
It has happened <S%H310>after<s%> all your <S%H7451>wickedness,<s%> <S%H188>(woe,<s%> <S%H188>woe<s%> to <S%H5002>you!<s%> says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%>),
that you have <S%H1129>built<s%> for yourselves a vaulted <S%H1354>place,<s%> and have <S%H6213>made<s%> yourselves a lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street.<s%>

You have <S%H1129>built<s%> your lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way,<s%> and have made your <S%H3308>beauty<s%> a <S%H8581>abomination,<s%> and have <S%H6589>opened<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%> to everyone who passed <S%H5674>by,<s%> and <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitution.<s%>

You have also committed sexual <S%H2181>immorality<s%> with the <S%H1121>Egyptians,<s%> your <S%H7934>neighbors,<s%> <S%H1432>great<s%> of <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> and have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

See <S%H5186>therefore,<s%> I have stretched out my <S%H3027>hand<s%> over <S%H1639>you,<s%> and have diminished your <S%H2706>ordinary<s%> <S%H5414>food,<s%> and delivered you to the <S%H5315>will<s%> of those who <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1323>you,<s%> the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> who are <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> of your <S%H2154>lewd<s%> <S%H1870>way.<s%>

You have played the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> also with the <S%H1121>Assyrians,<s%> <S%H1115>because<s%> you were <S%H7646>insatiable;<s%> <S%H2181>yes,<s%> you have played the prostitute with <S%H7654>them,<s%> and yet you weren't satisfied.

You have moreover <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>merchants,<s%> to <S%H3778>Chaldea;<s%> and yet you <S%H7646>weren't<s%> satisfied with <S%H2063>this.<s%>

How <S%H535>weak<s%> is your <S%H3826>heart,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> since you <S%H6213>do<s%> all these <S%H4639>things,<s%> the work of a <S%H7986%H99999>impudent<s%> <S%H2181>prostitute;<s%>

in that you <S%H1129>build<s%> your vaulted <S%H1354>place<s%> at the <S%H7218>head<s%> of every <S%H1870>way,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> your lofty <S%H7413>place<s%> in every <S%H7339>street,<s%> and have not been as a <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> in that you <S%H7046>scorn<s%> <S%H868>pay.<s%>
A <S%H802>wife<s%> who commits <S%H5003>adultery!<s%> who <S%H3947>takes<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> instead of her <S%H376>husband!<s%>

They <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H5078>gifts<s%> to all <S%H2181>prostitutes;<s%> but you <S%H5414>give<s%> your <S%H5083>gifts<s%> to all your <S%H157>lovers,<s%> and <S%H7809>bribe<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> that they may come to you on every <S%H5439>side<s%> for your <S%H8457>prostitution.<s%>

You are <S%H2016>different<s%> from other <S%H802>women<s%> in your <S%H8457>prostitution,<s%> in that no one <S%H310>follows<s%> you to play the <S%H2181>prostitute;<s%> and whereas you <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H868>hire,<s%> and no <S%H868>hire<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1961>you,<s%> therefore you are <S%H2016>different.<s%>
<S%H2181>Therefore,<s%> prostitute, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> Because your <S%H5178>filthiness<s%> was poured <S%H8210>out,<s%> and your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> through your <S%H8457>prostitution<s%> with your <S%H157>lovers;<s%> and because of all the <S%H1544>idols<s%> of your <S%H8441>abominations,<s%> and for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> that you gave to <S%H5414>them;<s%>

therefore <S%H6908>see,<s%> I will gather all your <S%H157>lovers,<s%> with whom you have taken <S%H6149>pleasure,<s%> and all those who you have <S%H157>loved,<s%> with all those who you have <S%H8130>hated;<s%> I will even <S%H6908>gather<s%> them against you on every <S%H5439>side,<s%> and will <S%H1540>uncover<s%> your <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> to <S%H7200>them,<s%> that they may see all your <S%H6172>nakedness.<s%>

I will <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5003>you,<s%> as women who break wedlock and <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%> are <S%H4941>judged;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> on you the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> and <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

I will also <S%H5414>give<s%> you into their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall throw <S%H2040>down<s%> your vaulted <S%H1354>place,<s%> and break <S%H5422>down<s%> your lofty <S%H7413>places;<s%> and they shall <S%H6584>strip<s%> you of your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H3627>jewels;<s%> and they shall <S%H3240>leave<s%> you <S%H5903>naked<s%> and <S%H6181>bore.<s%>

They shall also bring <S%H5927>up<s%> a <S%H6951>company<s%> against <S%H7275>you,<s%> and they shall stone you with <S%H68>stones,<s%> and thrust you <S%H1333>through<s%> with their <S%H2719>swords.<s%>

They shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> your <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> on you in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H802>women;<s%> and I will cause you to <S%H7673>cease<s%> from playing the <S%H2181>prostitute,<s%> and you shall also <S%H5414>give<s%> no hire any <S%H868>more.<s%>

So will I cause my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> toward you to <S%H5117>rest,<s%> and my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H8252>you,<s%> and I will be quiet, and will be no more <S%H3707>angry.<s%>

Because you have not <S%H2142>remembered<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H5271>youth,<s%> but have <S%H7264>raged<s%> against me in all these <S%H1887>things;<s%> therefore, behold, I also will <S%H5414>bring<s%> your <S%H1870>way<s%> on your <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> and you shall not <S%H6213>commit<s%> this <S%H2154>lewdness<s%> with all your <S%H8441>abominations.<s%>
<S%H4911>Behold,<s%> everyone who uses proverbs shall use this <S%H4911>proverb<s%> against <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, As is the <S%H517>mother,<s%> so is her <S%H1323>daughter.<s%>

You are the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of your <S%H517>mother,<s%> who <S%H1602>loathes<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> and her <S%H1121>sons;<s%> and you are the <S%H269>sister<s%> of your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> who <S%H1602>loathed<s%> their <S%H582>husbands<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons:<s%> your <S%H517>mother<s%> was a <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and your <S%H1>father<s%> a <S%H567>Amorite.<s%>

Your <S%H1419>elder<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> is <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> at your left <S%H8040>hand,<s%> she and her <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> and your <S%H6996>younger<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> who <S%H3427>dwells<s%> at your right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> is <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

Yet have you not <S%H1980>walked<s%> in their <S%H1870>ways,<s%> nor <S%H6213>done<s%> after their <S%H8441>abominations;<s%> <S%H6985>but,<s%> as if that were a very <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7843>thing,<s%> you were more corrupt than <S%H2004>they<s%> in all your <S%H1870>ways.<s%>

As I <S%H2416>live,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> your <S%H269>sister<s%> has not <S%H6213>done,<s%> she nor her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> as you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> you and your <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

<S%H5771>Behold,<s%> this was the iniquity of your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom:<s%> <S%H1347>pride,<s%> <S%H7653>fullness<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H7962>prosperous<s%> <S%H8252>ease<s%> was in her and in her <S%H1323>daughters;<s%> neither did she <S%H2388>strengthen<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy.<s%>
They were <S%H1361>haughty,<s%> and <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H8441>abomination<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5493>me:<s%> therefore I took them away as I saw <S%H7200>good.<s%>

Neither has <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> <S%H2398>committed<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of your <S%H2403>sins;<s%> but you have <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> more than <S%H2007>they,<s%> and have <S%H6663>justified<s%> your <S%H269>sisters<s%> by all your <S%H8441>abominations<s%> which you have <S%H6213>done.<s%>

You <S%H5375>also,<s%> bear you your own <S%H3639>shame,<s%> in that you have given <S%H6419>judgment<s%> for your <S%H269>sisters;<s%> through your <S%H2403>sins<s%> that you have committed more <S%H8581>abominable<s%> than <S%H2004>they,<s%> they are more <S%H6663>righteous<s%> that <S%H954>you:<s%> yes, be also confounded, and <S%H5375>bear<s%> your <S%H3639>shame,<s%> in that you have <S%H6663>justified<s%> your <S%H269>sisters.<s%>

I will turn <S%H7725>again<s%> their <S%H7622>captivity,<s%> the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of your <S%H7622>captives<s%> in their <S%H8432>midst;<s%>
that you may <S%H5375>bear<s%> your own <S%H3639>shame,<s%> and may be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> because of all that you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> in that you are a comfort to <S%H5162>them.<s%>

Your <S%H269>sisters,<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate;<s%> and <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to their former <S%H6927>estate;<s%> and you and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to your former <S%H6927>estate.<s%>
For your <S%H269>sister<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> was not <S%H8052>mentioned<s%> by your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of your <S%H1347>pride,<s%>

before your <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> was <S%H1540>uncovered,<s%> as at the <S%H6256>time<s%> of the <S%H2781>reproach<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H758>Syria,<s%> and of all who are <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H1323>her,<s%> the daughters of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> who do <S%H7590>despite<s%> to you all <S%H5439>around.<s%>

I will <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H3045>you;<s%> and you shall know that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%>

that you may <S%H2142>remember,<s%> and be <S%H954>confounded,<s%> and never <S%H6610>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> any <S%H6440>more,<s%> because of your <S%H3639>shame,<s%> when I have <S%H3722>forgiven<s%> you all that you have <S%H6213>done,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
